name: Gagapalos: Darwin was wrong!
description:
Darwin was so wrong!

Animals and plants are just stupid.

The intervention of a divine human being to regulate the ecosystems is indispensable.

We knew this from the beginning.

Now we have the proof with this scientific experiment!

...evolution is a lie...

HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard  :

  • Arrows (or WASD)
    • to move camera

Mouse : 

  • Left click on creatures and Drag & Drop-it
    • to move creatures in the world
  • Right & move mouse
    • to rotate camera
  • Roll the mouse wheel
    • to zoom in
